text: Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 60. I will not teach Dhamma to a person with a weapon in his hand who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๐. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้มีอาวุธในมือ”
60. I shall not teach Dhamma to one with a weapon in his hand who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
